Other Information.Additional Info: Large proteins like horseradish peroxidase are excluded due to size exclusion effect.
Ovalbumin is excluded due to its large size compared to the pore size of the material.
BSA is excluded because of its large size relative to the pore size of the MOF composite.

Other Information.Test Conditions: 90% ACN/1% TFA loading buffer, 80% ACN/1% H3PO4 washing buffer, 30% ACN/0.1% FA elution buffer
Other Information.Additional Info: Glycopeptides are selectively enriched due to their smaller size and hydrophilic interaction with the material.

Other Information.Test Conditions: 90% ACN/1% TFA loading buffer, 50% ACN/0.1% TFA washing buffer, 0.4 M ammonia solution elution buffer
Other Information.Additional Info: Phosphopeptides are selectively enriched based on IMAC affinity and their ability to pass through the mesoporous structure.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Enrichment of 26 glycopeptides and 12 phosphopeptides with high SNR and clear background

Other Information.Additional Info: The material demonstrated excellent size exclusion effects for large proteins while enriching smaller glycopeptides and phosphopeptides.
